contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Zmiiv |other_name = Зміїв |image_shield = Герб Змиева (1803).gif |shield_size = 90px |coordinates_display = inline,title |coordinates_region = UA |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = {{UKR}} |subdivision_type1 = [[Oblast]] |subdivision_name1 = [[Kharkiv Oblast]] |subdivision_type2 = [[Raion]] |subdivision_name2 = [[Zmiiv Raion]] |established_title = Founded |established_date = 1604 |established_title2 = City rights |established_date2 = 1797 |area_total_km2 = 55.77 |population_as_of = 2001 |population_total = 17063 |population_density_km2 = 306 |timezone = EET |utc_offset = +2 |timezone_DST = EEST |utc_offset_DST = +3 |latd=49 |latm=52 |lats=00 |latNS=N |longd=36 |longm=22 |longs=00 |longEW=E |postal_code_type = Postal code |postal_code = 63409 |blank_name = [[Licence plate]] |blank_info = ХА, 21 (old) |footnotes = }} '''Zmiiv''' ({{lang-uk|Зміїв}}, {{lang-ru|Змиёв}}) is a city in [[Kharkiv Oblast]] ([[oblast|province]]) of [[Ukraine]]. The population as of 2001 was 17,063. Zmiiv is the administrative center of [[Zmiivskyi Raion]]. Between 1976 and 1990, the city was renamed after [[Klement Gottwald]], a [[Czechoslovakia|Czechoslovak]] politician, to ''Gotwald'' ({{lang-uk|Готвальд}}). ==Geography== Zmiiv is situated on the right bank of the [[Seversky Donets]] River at the confluence of the right-hand tributary of the [[Mzha]] river. ==Economy== A machine-building plant is the largest company in town. Zmiiv also has a paper mill, dairy plant, food-processing plant, packaging works, construction materials plant, publishing company, and some repair shops. ==Transportation== Zmiiv is served by the [[Zmiiv (station)|Zmiiv station]] on the [[Southern Railway (Ukraine)|Southern Railway]]. The station was opened in 1910. It is served by the [[commuter rail]] (also known as [[Elektrichka|elektrichki]]) connecting [[Kharkiv]], [[Merefa]], and [[Izium]] with intermediate stops. Zmiiv has a bus station, which serves as a terminus for local bus routes. Zmiiv has also a regular bus connection with Kharkiv. ==Sports== Zmiiv has one [[soccer]] club playing in the Kharkiv Oblast Premier League, "Mayak". ==Points of interest== * Ionospheric Observatory, subsidiary of [[Kharkiv Polytechnical Institute]] ({{Coord|49|40|37|N|36|17|32|E|}}) [http://www.kpi.kharkiv.edu/iion/] [http://tourist.kharkov.ua/review_niceplaces/index.php?viewtopic=16] ==Notable residents== * [[Igor Volk]], cosmonaut and test pilot ==External links== * [http://www.kharkov.ua/region/towns-e.htm Towns of Kharkiv Region] * [http://zmievforum.com/ Zmiiv Forum] * [http://zmievy-gory.com/ Zmiiv portal] * [http://colovrat.at.ua/ History of Zmiiv] {{Kharkiv Oblast}} [[Category:Cities in Kharkiv Oblast]] {{Kharkiv-geo-stub}}
